# Warehouse Container Tracker Environment Configuration
# Copy this file to .env and fill in your actual values

# Firebase Configuration
FIREBASE_PROJECT_ID=your-project-id
FIREBASE_STORAGE_BUCKET=your-project-id.appspot.com
FIREBASE_MESSAGING_SENDER_ID=your-sender-id
FIREBASE_API_KEY=your-api-key

# Google Sheets Configuration
GOOGLE_SHEETS_SPREADSHEET_ID=your-spreadsheet-id
GOOGLE_SERVICE_ACCOUNT_EMAIL=your-service-account@project.iam.gserviceaccount.com

# Service Account JSON (base64 encoded)
GOOGLE_SERVICE_ACCOUNT_

# Admin Configuration
ADMIN_EMAIL=admin@yourcompany.com

# App Configuration
APP_NAME=Warehouse Container Tracker
APP_VERSION=1.0.0
DEBUG_MODE=true
LOG_LEVEL=debug

# Offline Configuration
OFFLINE_QUEUE_SIZE_LIMIT=100
OFFLINE_SYNC_INTERVAL_MINUTES=5

# Camera Configuration
CAMERA_RESOLUTION=high
PHOTO_COMPRESSION_QUALITY=85
MAX_PHOTO_SIZE_MB=10

# PDF Configuration
PDF_PAGE_FORMAT=A4
PDF_MARGIN_MM=20
PDF_FONT_SIZE=12

# Storage Configuration
TEMP_FILE_CLEANUP_HOURS=24
MAX_FILE_SIZE_MB=50
